title: Hachimitsu to Butterfly: Shokunin Koubou Series
original_name: はちみつとバタフライ~職人工房シリーズ~
sinopse:
The stories of girls chasing their dreams in the city of craftsmen. A collection of 5 love stories revolving around dolls, perfume, rings, and a piano.

(Source: Volume description)

1. Trunk Doll
2. Hachimitsu to Butterfly
3. Bittersweet
4. Café Colbel no Koi
5. Dramatic Doll
